channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2024010053
item.description:
Report X-2024010053

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-22
  • City: CASS CITY
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND UNLOADING INSIDE THE TRAILER. A SIDE OF THE BOX WAS WET. DURING INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED ONE BOTTLE INSIDE THE BOX WITH CAP/LID/TOP CRUSHED CAUSING THE BOTTLE TO LEAK. THE BOTTLES WERE INSIDE THE BOX IN INDIVIDUAL PLASTIC BAGS WITH AIR BAGS AROUND THEM. RESPONDER PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023120854
item.description:
Report X-2023120854

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This was a wet package unloaded from door 17. The container inside had a loose cap. The package was placed in a hazmat bin and put in the hazmat cage until it could be processed after the sort. DescribePack: The container inside had a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a hazmat bin and put in the hazmat cage until it could be processed after the sort.

item.title: Report X-2023120758
item.description:
Report X-2023120758

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: KALAMAZOO
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UPON OPENING THE TRAILER, PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING. RESPONDER CALLED IMMEDIATELY. NO OTHER PACKAGES LEAKED UPON. PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO DMP WHERE RESPONDER DETERMINED THAT 1/6 CARTRIDGES HAD LEAKED AND BEGAN PROCESSING THROUGH THE DMP
